name: coltishly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a young person moves coltishly, they move in a way that is energetic and attractive, but also slightly awkward: She was awkward and strange and coltishly beautiful. He strode coltishly on to the stage, giving an embarrassed wave to the audience.
More examplesFewer examplesChris attempts coltishly to show his love to Aisha.I have seen her stumbling round coltishly on her new high heels.They were naturally thin, coltishly thin, as only really young girls can be.
